}} 'Dearborn' is an Amtrak station in Dearborn, Michigan. It is located at 16121
Michigan Avenue, and is served by the [[Wolverine (train)|Wolverine]] service.
The station is a relatively contemporary structure of the late 20th century,
with a waiting room and ticket offices during station hours. Quik-Trak ticketing
kiosks are available at the station.




On 19 August 2011, it was announced that the Federal Railroad Administration had
released US$28.2 million in funds for the construction of a new intermodal
station to replace the current building; the new facility would serve both
intercity and commuter rail and include a connection to the Henry Ford
Museum.
categories: Buildings and structures in Dearborn, Michigan
